page.title: 04EXPLORERS.
page.content: My name is Julia McGough.I am eleven years old and I go to Explorers every Monday night from 06:30 to 07:30. Explorers is a church youth club .It is run by St John's Church,the vicar is Rev. Kelly.Mrs Hewer run the club. You go to Explorers from seven years old until you are eleven then you go to Path Finders. In Explorers you learn about the Bible. There are work sheets to do each night which you complete at home. You learn memory verses and play team games.When you have been for six weeks you get a badge.If you go to Church for twenty weeks you get a Bible.I like Explorers because it takes up your Monday night and it is quite good fun.
